messages.subject: Re: [Unschooling-dotcom] Messae for Casey, was  Re: Re: Re: Unschooling or not?
messages.msgSnippet: Hey, Casey, don t tell your mom but they will do kids rooms if you get your parents to do the work  Lynda P.S.  Sheldon Jackson in Sitka is the one he has
messages.messageBody:
Hey, Casey, don't tell your mom but they will do kids rooms if you get your
parents to do the work <g>

Lynda

P.S. Sheldon Jackson in Sitka is the one he has applied to. He wants to do
2 years there and then transfer to a university in Scotland.

P.S. #2 We were thinking of something along the lines of what the lamp lady
does with lots of hot pink and lavendar with maybe some yellow ribbons <g>
----- Original Message -----
From: "zenmomma *" <zenmomma@...>
To: <Unschooling-dotcom@yahoogroups.com>
Sent: Monday, April 01, 2002 6:36 AM
Subject: [Unschooling-dotcom] Re: Re: Re: Unschooling or not?


> >>Son #2 is applying to a college in Alaska in hopes of a
> fall admission. >>
>
> Cool. What colleges are up there?
>
> >>We told them that would be fine but we might decide to do a Trading
Spaces
> >>thing while they were gone and their rooms might be the spaces <g> >>
>
> LOL! If you do, be sure to do one of those treatments where the room ends
up
> painted in plaid or draped in curtains like a circus tent. ;-)
>
> Casey had me go to their website because she sooo wanted to do Trading
> Spaces with a friend, trading their bedrooms. She was very upset to learn
> that you had to be 18.
>
> Life is good.
> ~Mary
>
>
